DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis study extend second stage labor beyond current ACOG suggestion reduce cesarean delivery rate . The cesarean delivery rate United States around 30 percent . This number continue increase last decade continue climb . Each subsequent cesarean section put mother baby increase risk postpartum hemorrhage , bowel bladder injury , abnormal placentation , febrile morbidity death . The common reason cesarean delivery repeat cesarean delivery . One way reduce number prevent first cesarean delivery . The aim study evaluate extend second stage labor affect cesarean delivery rate subsequent perinatal morbidity .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Control Trial Second Stage Labor
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Consent time admission office 2 . 2nd stage start full dilation 3 . Randomization occur 2 hour without epidural 3 hour epidural , stratify epidural status 4 . Randomization scheme accord predetermine computer-generated block randomization scheme block size 6,8 and12 ( random block ) . 5 . Sequentially numbered seal opaque envelope prepare accord randomization scheme deliver secure container labor delivery suite maintain conceal treatment allocation . 6 . At 3 hour mark , next number envelope pull opened physician/nurse reveal designate group . At point patient consider randomize . 7 . Provider preference cesarean delivery , operative vaginal delivery , continue push , intention-to-treat analysis 8 . Those require cesarean delivery - usual perioperative management 9 . Early termination criterion : emergency cesarean delivery , category 3 fetal heart trace
